ServerSide.db

Class QueryGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerSide.db.QueryGenerator

  • public class QueryGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    QueryGenerator: A factory of queries based on IEntity. It is impossible to create an instance of this class, all the methods in this class is static.

    • Method Detail

      • generateCheckCostumersSubscriptionQuery

        public static java.lang.String generateCheckCostumersSubscriptionQuery()
        Returns:
        A query which calling to stored procedure that checks the costumers in shop subscription expire Date.

      • generateComplaintsReportQuery

        public static java.lang.String generateComplaintsReportQuery(int shopManagerId,
                                                             java.lang.String year,
                                                             int querter)
        Parameters:
        shopManagerId - The ID of the required shop complaints report.
        year - the year of the required complaints report.
        querter - the quarter of the required complaints report.
        Returns:
        A query which calling to stored procedure that returns complaints report of a specific shop.

      • generateDeleteQuery

        public static <TData extends IEntity> java.lang.String generateDeleteQuery(@NotNull
                                                                           TData entity)
        Generate "DELETE" query by the received IEntity type and states.
        Type Parameters:
        TData - An instance which implements IEntity.
        Parameters:
        entity - An IEntity of the requested type.
        Returns:
        A "DELETE" query if the type is supported and all the necessary states exists, and null id does not.

      • generateIncomesReportQuery

        Parameters:

        year - the year of the required incomes report.
        querter - the quarter of the required incomes report.
        Returns:
        A query which calling to stored procedure that returns incomes report of a specific shop.

        public static java.lang.String generateLastIdQuery()
        Returns:

      • generateSelectQuery

        public static <TData extends IEntity> java.lang.String generateSelectQuery(@NotNull
                                                                           TData entity)
        Generate "SELECT" query by the received IEntity type and states, this query should select only one IEntity by the IEntity ID.
        Type Parameters:
        TData - An instance which implements IEntity.
        Parameters:
        entity - An IEntity of the requested type.
        Returns:

        public static java.lang.String generateUpdateAllUsersToDisconnectQuery()
